name: The Nightmare (Acciaio)
description:
The Nightmare

It's terrible to have a nightmare, isn't it? It's all dark and gloomy... full of creatures trying to kill you. Do you dare to face this endless, horrifying experience against tons of spooky skulls?

This game was born while tinkering with lights. Nothing special, to be honest, but I enjoyed developing it! Feel free to try it and give me some feedback! If there is even a person that likes this, I plan on adding some powerups and collectibles to the endless skulls wave.

Current powerups & collectibles:

  • Health pack (lub-dub)
